cast.name: 亚历克斯·布伦德穆尔 Àlex Brendemühl
马塞尔·博拉斯 Marcel Borràs
卡罗琳娜·尤斯特 Carolina Yuste
帕特里克·克里亚多 Patrick Criado

director.name: 亚历杭德罗·马林 Alejandro Marín

introduction: “La Canción” tells the story, in a fiction series which takes in the main events: the enrolment of real life Artur Caps, an Austrian emigré but king of TVE’s variety shows, to choose the song; the choice of Joan Manuel Serrat, an icon of Catalan dissidence so symbol of Spanish modernity, to sing it; when Serrat pulls out, denied the right to sing “La, la, la” in Catalan, the desperate recourse to firebrand Massiel, who, despite little time to rehearse, pulls of a great performance at London’s Albert Hall. Caps’ wingman is the series’ protagonist Esteban, pig ignorant about music but driven by the initial dogged ambition of scaling posts in Franco’s government.
